channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Commerce Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Commerce Platform

item.title: CVE-2022-21559|2024-08-03T02:46:38.034Z -- oracle%20corporation -- commerce%20platform
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Commerce Platform product of Oracle Commerce (component: Dynamo Application Framework). Supported versions that are affected are 11.3.0, 11.3.1 and 11.3.2. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with logon to the infrastructure where Oracle Commerce Platform executes to compromise Oracle Commerce Platform. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Oracle Commerce Platform accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 5.5 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:L/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).

item.title: CVE-2022-21387|2024-08-03T02:38:55.909Z -- oracle%20corporation -- commerce%20platform
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Commerce Platform product of Oracle Commerce (component: Dynamo Application Framework). Supported versions that are affected are 11.3.0, 11.3.1 and 11.3.2. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Commerce Platform. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle Commerce Platform accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 5.3 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).

item.title: CVE-2024-21100|2024-08-01T22:13:42.367Z -- oracle%20corporation -- commerce%20platform
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Commerce Platform product of Oracle Commerce (component: Platform). Supported versions that are affected are 11.3.0, 11.3.1 and 11.3.2. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Commerce Platform. While the vulnerability is in Oracle Commerce Platform, attacks may significantly impact additional products (scope change). Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of Oracle Commerce Platform accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.0 (Integrity impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:C/C:N/I:L/A:N).
